subject: English
atomic_concept: We use our mouth to eat and talk.

nested_learning.intuition: The mouth helps us eat food and speak.
nested_learning.concept: We eat and talk using our mouth.
nested_learning.example: I eat my food with my mouth.

misconception_fit: We do not eat with our ears.
Mouth is not used to see.
socratic_prompts: Which body part helps you eat?
Can you talk without opening your mouth?

difficulty_modes.medium: We use our mouth to eat and talk.
difficulty_modes.hard: The mouth helps us eat food and speak.
difficulty_modes.master: The mouth is a body part used for eating and speaking.
